title: Riot server problems?
body: Is the Riot server like having big problems these days? I had a norms where I hopped into game and all of a sudden the game disconnected everyone in it and made the game disappear not even in match history, then I had a game lobby in which all of us dc and reconected. Today the client just never reconnected..

replies.body: That wasn't exactly a server issue, but the game itself crashed for some reason. When it happens, just like you said everyone will be disconnected and won't be able to rejoin since the game completely disappears. You won't be hit with any punishments and should be able to requeue.
